com.nhaarman.listviewanimations

Class ArrayAdapter<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.widget.BaseAdapter
      • com.nhaarman.listviewanimations.ArrayAdapter<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.widget.Adapter, android.widget.ListAdapter, android.widget.SpinnerAdapter, Insertable<T>, Swappable, Iterable<T>, Collection<T>, List<T>

    public abstract class ArrayAdapter<T>
extends android.widget.BaseAdapter
implements List<T>, Swappable, Insertable<T>
    A true ArrayList adapter providing access to all ArrayList methods. Also implements Swappable for easy object swapping, and Insertable for inserting objects.

    • Field Summary

      • Fields inherited from interface android.widget.Adapter

        IGNORE_ITEM_VIEW_TYPE, NO_SELECTION

        Returns:

        public void swapItems(int positionOne,
             int positionTwo)
        Description copied from interface: Swappable
        Swaps the item on the first adapter position with the item on the second adapter position. Be sure to call BaseAdapter.notifyDataSetChanged() if appropriate when implementing this method.

        Parameters:
